description: A virtual traveling assistant that provides location information, journey management, and device recommendations for travelers using an offline database.
name: Virtual Traveling Bot

traveler_id.description: The ID of the traveler to get view information for

coordinates.description: The geographic coordinates of the location

location_address.description: The address of the current location
